mapper.sql: g.ID, g.NAME, g.NOTE, g.CREATE_USER_ID, g.CREATE_ORGAN_ID, g.CREATE_TIME, g.LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID, g.LAST_UPDATE_TIME, g.ACTIVE

sql.if: and (g.NAME like CONCAT('%',#{searchCondition},'%') or g.NOTE like CONCAT('%',#{searchCondition},'%'))

mapper.select:
select b.NAME as CREATE_USER_NAME, e.selectedUserIds, e.selectedUserNames,
from group_info g LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON b.ID = g.CREATE_USER_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT group_concat(u.NAME separator ',') as selectedUserNames, group_concat(o.USER_ID separator ',') as selectedUserIds, o.GROUP_ID FROM group_user o LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON o.USER_ID= u.id GROUP BY o.GROUP_ID ) e on g.id = e.GROUP_ID where g.ACTIVE = 1
ORDER BY g.CREATE_TIME DESC

select b.NAME as CREATE_USER_NAME, e.selectedUserIds, e.selectedUserNames,
from group_info g LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON b.ID = g.CREATE_USER_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT group_concat(u.NAME separator ',') as selectedUserNames, group_concat(o.USER_ID separator ',') as selectedUserIds, o.GROUP_ID FROM group_user o LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON o.USER_ID= u.id GROUP BY o.GROUP_ID ) e on g.id = e.GROUP_ID where g.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
